mapper.select: SELECT ci.username AS userName, ci.company_info_name AS companyInfoName, cr.coffee_request_phone AS coffeeRequestPhone, cr.coffee_request_address AS coffeeRequestAddress, cr.coffee_request_amount AS coffeeRequestAmount, cr.coffee_request_date AS coffeeRequestDate, cd.coffee_delivery_status AS coffeeDeliveryStatus FROM coffee_delivery cd INNER JOIN coffee_request cr ON cr.coffee_request_idx = cd.coffee_request_idx INNER JOIN company_info ci ON cd.company_info_idx = ci.company_info_idx WHERE cd.username = #{userId};

SELECT cr.username AS userName, cr.coffee_request_phone AS coffeeRequestPhone, cr.coffee_request_address AS coffeeRequestAddress, cr.coffee_request_amount AS coffeeRequestAmount, cr.coffee_request_date AS coffeeRequestDate, COALESCE(ci.company_info_name,(SELECT ci.company_info_name FROM company_info ci WHERE ci.username = #{userId})) AS companyInfoName, COALESCE(crc.coffee_request_confirm_status, '대기중') AS coffeeRequestConfirmStatus FROM coffee_request cr LEFT JOIN coffee_request_confirm crc ON crc.coffee_request_idx = cr.coffee_request_idx LEFT JOIN company_info ci ON ci.company_info_idx = crc.company_info_idx WHERE cr.username = #{userId} ORDER BY cr.coffee_request_date DESC;
SELECT company_info_idx as companyInfoIdx FROM company_info WHERE username = #{userId};
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO coffee_request( username, company_contract_idx, company_info_idx, inventory_idx, coffee_request_amount, coffee_request_address, coffee_request_phone, coffee_request_content, coffee_request_date )VALUES(#{userId},1,#{companyInfoIdx},1,#{amount},#{address},#{phone},#{message},now());
